activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_abdm#10
activity.text: Hello @khavinshankar, I have gone through the care_fe module and checked how the OTP module works there. I got this api which can be used to send OTP in this module, If this is the implementation of the OTP we are looking for, then we can -> 1. Generate OTP 2. For phone number i have gone through the [HipPatientCareContextDiscoverSerializer](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_abdm/blob/aa0853313d332a815db217c5741a4c1170b3c1e5/abdm/api/v3/serializers/hip.py#L47), we can use the abhaAddress and get the phone number from [PatientSerializer](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_abdm/blob/aa0853313d332a815db217c5741a4c1170b3c1e5/abdm/api/v3/serializers/hip.py#L213) 3. Send the OTP using the api. ETA: 2-3 days

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10924
activity.text:
Hello @rithviknishad, 
There is is npm package named [i18n-unused](https://www.npmjs.com/package/i18n-unused) using this we can create a script to remove the unused keys.
To prevent this in future we can add this script CI/CD integration.

activity.text: Hi, @Jeffrin2005 I have checked for the issue, I am not able to find any icon name "Edit2" in UniconPaths.json file Instead there is another for "l-edit" named "l-edit-alt" which is viewed as - Please let me know if I missed something.
